ygData.subject: RE: Frozen Gob in Permafrost?
ygData.msgSnippet: OK thanks for the info! What does the Scryer drop?? ... From: Whitcraft,David [mailto:DWHITCRAFT@cerner.com] Sent: Thursday, November 18, 1999 9:40 AM To:
ygData.messageBody:
OK thanks for the info!
What does the Scryer drop??
:)


-----Original Message-----
From: Whitcraft,David [mailto:DWHITCRAFT@...]
Sent: Thursday, November 18, 1999 9:40 AM
To: 'EQCheats@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Frozen Gob in Permafrost?


From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>

The frozen goblin is actually in the SCRYER room. The King's room is the
raised/lower floor room just this side of the diplomat and Vox's tunnels.
I've seen the frozen gobbie, but I don't know what his deal is... And yea,.
I seen that map. It's inaccurate, although the layout is essentially correct
I think, just mob names are wrong.

-----Original Message-----
From: Sean.Clark@... [mailto:Sean.Clark@...]
Sent: November 18, 1999 10:17 AM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: [EQCheats] Frozen Gob in Permafrost?


From: Sean.Clark@...


Anybody have any info on the frozen gob in Permafrost? One of my maps
indicates the room that he is in is the "King" room, but I believe that is a
mistake. The gob is in an oval shaped room in a giant block of ice. He is
wearing some sort of a hat or crown, and he is not targetable.
Anybody know anything about this gob?
